org.apache.hc.client5.http.async.methods

Class SimpleHttpRequests

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hc.client5.http.async.methods.SimpleHttpRequests
  • Deprecated. 
    Use SimpleRequestBuilder.

    @Deprecated
public final class SimpleHttpRequests
extends Object
    Common HTTP methods using SimpleHttpRequest as a HTTP request message representation.
    Since:
    5.0
